content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Good afternoon, Mr. Trabelsi. Thank you for considering my property. Based on our previous discussion, I believe we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I am willing to negotiate on the rental price, but I must emphasize that as a landlord, my primary goal is to maximize my gains. With that said, I am open to hearing your proposal. Please let me know what you have in mind.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 1000 Euros per month. Is that acceptable?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your offer, Mr. Trabelsi. While I appreciate your willingness to pay 1000 Euros per month, I must respectfully decline. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I believe a higher rental price would be more appropriate. I am willing to negotiate, but I must emphasize that my primary goal as a landlord is to maximize my gains. With that said, I am open to hearing your counteroffer. Please let me know what you have in mind.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 1200 Euros per month, is that acceptable?

Also, I am concerned about the utilities. I understand that I am responsible for paying them, but I am worried about the cost. Can you give me an estimate of how much I can expect to pay monthly for utilities?

Thank you for your time, Mr. Heine.

Best regards,

Aziz Trabelsi.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your counteroffer, Mr. Trabelsi. I appreciate your willingness to pay 1200 Euros per month. While I understand your concern about utilities, I must emphasize that as a landlord, my primary goal is to maximize my gains. With that said, I am open to negotiating on the rental price, but I must emphasize that my primary goal is to maximize my gains. Based on our previous discussion, I believe a rental price of 1200 Euros per month is reasonable. However, I must emphasize that this is my final offer and I am not willing to negotiate further. If you are willing to accept this offer, I agree to the price of 1200 Euros per month. If not, I must respectfully terminate our negotiation. Thank you for your time, Mr. Trabelsi. Best regards.
name: Heinrich Heine
